document.full_text: muammar gaddafi's better armed and organized troops reversed the rapid westward advance of rebels on tuesday as world powers meeting in london piled pressure on the libyan leader to step down.
document.title: libya troops advance east; powers want gaddafi out
lines_and_colors: muammar gaddafi's better armed and organized troops reversed the rapid westward advance of rebels on tuesday as world powers meeting in london piled pressure on the libyan leader to step down.
